attributes.action: Legalise weed for medical and recreational use
attributes.additional_details:
• Cannabis is less dangerous than alcohol and tobacco which is legal in the UK
• Legalization of marijuana is phasing out black markets and taking money away from  organised crime
• Legalisation creates more jobs
• In Colorado, since legalisation for recreational use there has been a drop in crime and murder rates
• Legalizing marijuana would end the costly enforcement of marijuana laws and free up police resources
• Cannabis can help physical and mental health problems and for many is effective
attributes.background:
• Legal Cannabis is regulated for consumer safety  
• Cannabis can kill cancer cells
• Legalising Cannabis could help the economy and generate approx £900m in tax
